title: What Will The Stock Market Do Next? - Ep 4
itunes:title: What Will The Stock Market Do Next? - Ep 4
description:
Every time the stock market takes a turn, all sorts of “experts” make all sorts of predictions about what’ll happen next. But who’s right? Can we even tell? Listen to Vitaliy’s value-investor take on this (hint: he doesn’t think much of any predictions).

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/will-stock-market-next/

To learn more about the value investing principles that lie at the core of Vitaliy's articles on investing, check out the first episode of this podcast, The 6 Commandments of Value Investing.

Vitaliy's investment firm, IMA, uses these value investing principles to create low-risk, long-term oriented portfolios. To learn more about their investment process and one-of-a-kind client experience, visit imausa.com.
